hadiths.text: Qais, Abu ‘Umarah, the freed slave of the Ansar, said:“I heard ‘Abdullah bin Abu Bakr bin Muhammad bin ‘Amr bin Hazm narrating from his father, from his grandfather, that the Prophet (ﷺ) said: ‘There is no believer who consoles for his brother for a calamity, but Allah will clothe him with garments of honor on the Day of Resurrection.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي ثَوَابِ مَنْ عَزَّى مُصَابًا
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the reward for one who consoles a person afflicted by calamity
